readable.title: 2515247156_c1b759fc33
readable.content: A boy goes down a blue slide with his eyes closed . A young boy slides down a blue slide with his eyes closed while a woman with sunglasses watches , smiling . A young male child slides down a blue slide while his mom watches . Child sliding down a blue slide with mother at the top of the slide . Little boy coming at camera down blue slide , smiling woman in background .
